annotation: can't tell whether the 'l' is a capital 'eye' or a small 'ell'

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: dialect variation : kœi "big", kuik "head", kùth(a) "end", -l having-adjective
Means 'long', without any further specification of height or length acceptation of this word
